credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Competition Design for  La Fenice, Venice: Roof Plan
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli (1845-1926), Rome; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and pink and gray wash, graphite on heavy laid paper.
description: Plan of the roof of theater and annex building: a rectangular roof at left is joined to a horseshoe-shaped roof at right.
name: Drawing
